text:
I want to make an interactive installer.

For eg. during normal installation , i will install the framework in say

 c:\home-dir

Now instead of c:\ if he wants to install the framework in d: , i should prompt 
the user and at run time I should select the drive.

The objective is I should select the value of some properties at runtime, 
interactively.
creator: sudhir.howale@mphasis.com

text:
Why do you propose to use Ant for this purpose?
It seems somewhat outside the scope of Ant.

The nightly builds now (starting with 2001-12-08 IIRC) have a new task <input>
